item.description:
It's been ages since we've been to the Kumo in Hamden. I get sushi there every week because it's fresh and delicious AND half-price for lunch! Their half-price special is extended to all day on Sundays.

For those of you new to the group, we usually order a bunch of rolls "family style" and share; however, you are free to opt out and order your own meal. If anyone is interested in doing hibachi, please note that preference when you RSVP, so I can let the restaurant know.

 

http://www.yelp.com/biz/kumo-japanese-restaurant-hamden

 

*** We collect a small fee of $1.00 per guest to offset the monthly charge for running the meetup. It is very much appreciated! ***

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Half-Price Sushi Sunday at Kumo in Hamden
